title: HOOK
description:
Install instructions:
1. Extract and run "Hook.exe"
2. Play
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!
Credits: knabberfee for the upload, many thanks!

Title: Hook
Genre: Casual, Indie
Developer: Maciej Targoni, Wojciech Wasiak 
Publisher: Rainbow Train	
Release Date: Jan 25, 2015
Store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/367580/

About:
HOOK is a short minimal, puzzle game that I made after getting a lot of positive feedback about a prototype that is published on Kongregate.

Minimum system requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 
Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 100 MB available space 
Sound Card: Any
